Package com.jalios.jcmsplugin.collaborativespace

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CSConstants
    CollaborativeSpace constants.
    MemberLoginBuilder
    Helper to build a customized Member's login.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessPolicyCollaborativeSpaceSelector
    Filters CollaborativeSpace given an access policy.
    AddApplicationServiceHandler  
    AvailableServiceSelector
    Keeps only Portlets that belongs to given Workspace, or "reference" Portlet that belongs to a model.
    CollaborativeSpaceSelector
    Excludes Publications in a closed workspace.
    CollaborativeSpaceTextSelector  
    CreateSpaceHandler
    This Form handler is used to process Collaborative Space creation.
    CSAffinityComparator<T extends generated.CollaborativeSpace>  
    CSChannelListener
    If no Collaborative Space Model is retrieved, this Channel Listener will create it after store has been loaded.
    CSCollaborativeSpaceListener
    This listener saves the CollaborativeSpace's root Category as an extra info on the CollaborativeSpace.
    CSCollaborativeSpaceSelector
    Allows to filter on only not model, not closed, and readable CollaborativeSpaces.
    CSDataController
    This DataController ensures: compatibility between ACCESS policy and SIGNUP policy compatibility between sub space ACCESS policy and parent space ACCESS policy space has at least one PortletSelection within its children space has no invalid category
    CSDataSyncManager  
    CSEditAdministratorsHandler
    A custom handler to edit CollaborativeSpace's administrators.
    CSEditMemberHandler
    A custom Member handler to edit CollaborativeSpace's members.
    CSGroupController  
    CSHelper
    An utility class for constants and helper methods on CollaborativeSpace Portlet objects.
    CSHubHandler  
    CSHubHandler.FavoriteCollaborativeSpaceComparator  
    CSHubHandler.FavoritePortalComparator
    Compares 2 publications based on their workspace and the position of this workspace in member's favorite workspaces.
    CSInvitation
    A Class to send invitation to Member.
    CSManager
    The CollaborativeSpace manager singleton.
    CSManager.MemberCollaborativeSpaceSelector
    Filters only on opened, and not model CollaborativeSpaces, which member belongs to.
    CSManager.MemberOtherCollaborativeSpaceSelector
    Filters only on opened, and not model CollaborativeSpaces, which member does not belong to, and which he can see.
    CSMemberController
    This DataController will delete a pending CSSignupRequest in case of member is enrolled manually in space.
    CSModelSelectionHandler  
    CSNode
    Utility class to represent a CollaborativeSpace hierarchy.
    CSPortalElementController
    This DataController ensures no dashboard nor application Portlets belongs to private or secret CollaborativeSpace model.
    CSPortalPolicyFilter
    This PolicyFilter has several purposes: forces portal to stay in collaborative space presentation by typology portal, or to go the CS portal forces a CSRequest to be displayed in its storage workspace
    CSQueryBuilder
    A builder to retrieve a Set of Workspace by using CollaborativeSpace filters (isModel / hasModel / typology)
    CSRequestController
    This class processes the CSRequest instance after it is updated.
    CSRequestRightPolicyFilter
    This PolicyFilter ensures confidentiality of secret CSRequest.
    CSRightPolicyFilter
    This PolicyFilter ensures confidentiality in Collaborative Spaces.
    CSSearchCategoryBrowser  
    CSSignupRequestController
    Processes signup on update operation.
    CSSlaveDataController
    This synchronizes Workspace, CollaborativeSpace and root Category's title.
    CSSuggestionManager  
    CSTemplatePolicyFilter
    This class defines templates to use to create/update Collaborative Space.
    CSTypologySelector
    Selector to filter on publication having given typology.
    CSUtil
    Static utilities for CSP.
    CSWizardPolicyFilter
    Custom behavior of workspace duplicate in case of CollaborativeSpace.
    CSWKRoleController  
    CSWorkspaceController
    This class checks there is 1 CollaborativeSpace for 1 Workspace.
    CSWorkspaceListener
    This listener cleans CollaborativeSpace's invitation when their space is deleted.
    CSWorkspaceModelDataController
    Prevent a csp to have a model when a workspace is set as a model
    DBCommentHelper  
    EditCSInvitationHandler
    Custom Edit handler for CSInvitation.
    EditCSJMobileSettingsHandler  
    EditServiceHandler
    A custom handler to use for Service management.
    EditSettingsHandler
    A handler used to manage CS settings.
    EnrollMembersHandler
    A custom handler to process member enrollment.
    FollowSpaceHandler
    This Form handler is used for a loggedMember to follow the current CollaborativeSpace.
    HomePortalSelector
    Returns only Publications being the home portal of their workspace.
    LeaderFirstComparator
    This comparator returns global admin first, then given Workspace's leaders first, then other Members alphabetically.
    ModelCollaborativeSpaceSelector
    Excludes model CollaborativeSpace.
    NoAncestorGroupSelector Deprecated.
    see NonCSGroupsMakingMemberBelongToCS
    NonCSGroupsMakingMemberBelongToCS
    Goal: retrieve the member's groups making him a member of given CS, but from which he cannot remove himself by an "unsubscribe" operation.
    OpenCollaborativeSpaceSelector
    Excludes closed CollaborativeSpace.
    PolicyManager
    Manager to handle custom CollaborativeSpace policies.
    ProcessInvitationHandler
    A custom handler to process sending of invitations.
    PublicationCollaborativeSpaceSelector
    Excludes Publications not in a CollaborativeSpace.
    PublicationInModelWorkspaceSelector
    Excludes Publications in a model workspace.
    PublicationInOpenWorkspaceSelector
    Excludes Publications in a closed workspace.
    PublicationInWorkspaceTitleSelector
    Excludes Publications not in a CollaborativeSpace.
    PublicationWorkspaceSelector
    Only keeps Publications not in a CollaborativeSpace.
    RecommendationAlertBuilder
    A recommandation to join a CollaborativeSpace as an Alert.
    RecommendationHandler
    Handler to recommend to join a Collaborative Space.
    ReferencePortletSelector
    Keeps only Portlets that uses "reference" copy mode or Portlet that belongs given Workspace
    SendInvitationHandler
    A custom handler to send invitations.
    ServiceTitleComparator<T extends com.jalios.jcms.Publication>
    A comparator to sort services alphabetically.
    SignupHandler
    A custom handler to process Collaborative Space signup.
    ValidateSignupHandler  
    WorkspaceTypologyDataController
    This class ensures a typology Category is not used to categorize the CS workspace.
